summary: Comprehensive benchmarking: identified path to world-class

learning_events.content: Our FBP implementation matches BurnP3+ - using correct Canadian system
CRITICAL GAP: No hourly weather system - need FWI calculation from met data
CRITICAL GAP: No spotting model - Fort Mac spread due to spotting
Prometheus uses Huygens wavelets - better than simple ellipse
All top models use: hourly weather, spotting, crown fire, validation
Completed: Cross-validation against BurnP3+, Prometheus, FARSITE
